WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I encounter an issue with the result of TypeMap.GetSourceValueResolvers().
I can cast the result to IMemberResolver, but it fails if I try to cast to IMemberGetter.
I need to do that for reasons detailled here (http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3405149/how-to-find-the-source-property-based-on-the-name-of-a-flattened-property-with-au/4076840#4076840)
 
Is there something special to do to be able to do that (implement something on my mapped objects for example) ?
 
Thank you very much
WorkItem.Summary: GetSourceValueResolvers() result can't be cast to IMemberGetter
